scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix services/api install && npm --prefix services/site install
scripts.stop: pm2 stop all && pm2 del all
scripts.dev:api: npm --prefix services/api install && npm --prefix services/api run start:dev
scripts.dev:site: npm --prefix services/site install && wait-on -l tcp:$API_PORT && npm --prefix services/site run dev
scripts.lint: npm --prefix services/api run lint && npm --prefix services/site run lint
